title: Real-Time Alerts for Client Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to receive real-time alerts for significant changes in my clients' health metrics so that I can respond quickly and provide timely interventions when necessary.

title: Secure Communication Platform for Caregiver Coordination
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a secure communication platform within ALFRED so that I can coordinate care effectively and maintain clear communication with my clients' families while ensuring their data privacy.

title: User-Friendly Health Metrics Dashboard for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a simple and intuitive health metrics dashboard so that I can efficiently monitor my clients' health status in real-time without navigating complex interfaces.

title: Personalized Health Alert Customization for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to customize health alerts for each of my clients so that I can receive timely notifications about critical changes in their health status and provide appropriate interventions.

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to seamlessly integrate client health data for real-time monitoring so that I can track multiple clients' health metrics and respond swiftly to any anomalies.

title: Timely Check-In Reminders for Care Coordination
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want ALFRED to send me timely reminders for check-ins so that I can effectively coordinate care and ensure the well-being of my clients.

title: Video Consultation Support for Caregivers and Healthcare Collaboration
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to initiate video consultations with healthcare providers through ALFRED so that I can coordinate care effectively and keep family members informed about clients' health statuses.

title: Caregiver Access Control for Client Health Data
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want secure access to my clients' health data so that I can monitor their well-being and respond promptly to any health concerns while respecting their privacy.

title: Training Resources for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want access to comprehensive training resources for using ALFRED effectively, so that I can efficiently monitor my clients' health and coordinate their care.
